articles.title: Traditional healer verifies son on trial for Babita Deokaran murder is South African - TimesLIVE
articles.description: The issue of the nationality of one of the six men accused of killing Gauteng health whistleblower Babita Deokaran was resolved on Thursday with his mother in KwaZulu-Natal verifying he is South African.
